parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.92

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets the height of a 2D control. [[ctrlCommit]] is required to complete the operation.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> control [[ctrlSetPositionH]] h

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>control: [[Control]] - 2D control

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>h: [[Number]] - Height of the control

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[ctrlSetPositionH]] 0.5;
_ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlSetPosition]] [[ctrlSetPositionX]] [[ctrlSetPositionY]] [[ctrlSetPositionW]]
</value></part></template></root>
